co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper.eventhandling

Class EventHandlerForge

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.forgewrapper.eventhandling.EventHandlerForge

  • public final class EventHandlerForge
extends java.lang.Object
    Used so I don't have to ASM as many events in. All event priorities are set to highest as MPIs take precedence over mods.
    Author:
    Niadel
